# **Install tidymass**

You can just use the `devtools` or `remote` to install `tidymass`. 


```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
if(!require(devtools)){
install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("tidymass/tidymass")
```
